summary.title: Summary
text: I research and develop Artificial Intelligence (AI) based systems.
Founder of a startup, Master's degree in Artificial Intelligence, and Bachelor's degree in Computer Science.
My technical interests are AI/ML, Distributed Computing, Edge Computing, Data Science, Entrepreneurship, Startups, and Innovation.
What motivates me is solving complex problems with AI, innovate responsibly and contribute to building a better world in an intelligent way.

description: Startup built from an Indoor Positioning System based on Machine Learning and Wi-Fi signals developed in partnership with a research lab;
and a service provider focused on Artificial Intelligence based Systems.
Gold Energy needed help capturing official data from the national energy reserve to use in their prediction models.
I built libraries to download them, read and write in custom formats, integrate with Pandas and Notebooks, and visualize and analyze them.
impact: The final product allowed updating data on a daily basis, without overloading the official servers.
The tools are now used by their bots, developers, and data scientists.

description: Its owner contacted me with an idea to connect warehouses and independent drop-shipping sellers.
I proposed and coordinated the development of a platform to handle purchasing, inventory control, dispatching, integration with marketplaces, pre‐sales, and post‐sales.
impact: The project evolved into a minimum value project (MVP) and has now become a startup.

description: The company, a manufacturer of high-capacity enterprise SSDs with internal processing located in California, USA, needed help to find applications for their product, composed of servers with multiple intelligent SSDs.
I developed multiple distributed computer vision algorithms, federated learning, microservices, web apps to demonstrate uses, and tools to automatized configurations.
We also evaluated a Verilog accelerator, batch and stream processing solutions, and deployed APIs with Machine Learning algorithms.
impact: We identified issues in the platform and MVPs were used to show use cases to clients, helping them close contracts.

description: One of its research laboratories developed an Indoor Positioning System and needed help exploring commercial options and improve it.
Acting as a commercial partner, I created the startup, coordinated and developed the technology and its applications until a minimum product.
impact: We were selected for a business incubator, for the Swissnex AIT program, introduced it to international investors, clients and used resources to develop new features.

description: INOVAX needed help on a project with many subcontractors and its processes.
I acted as a full stack software developer and helped them build a website to validate the flow of documents from these subcontractors, through INOVAX, to its final client.
impact: The project improved its efficiency, validating many errors at the subcontractor level before even reaching INOVAX.

description: The company developed a system for a multinational energy provider to track, identify and perform routinely planned maintenance.
I translated this system into Portuguese, learned how to use it, and trained operators.
To this end, we travelled and interacted with employees in Italy, Brazil and the United States.
impact: The operators were capacitated to use the system, and the project was rolled out to hydroelectric plants across America.

description: The company had a branch of people from Process Engineering and needed help validating the technical aspects of their proposals.
I participated in meetings with clients, helped them with technological perspectives, and gathering requirements.
I later migrated to their development branch, performing as a full stack software engineer, scrum master, and test engineer.
impact: Together, we completed two projects for a major client from the Brazillian mineral sector and one project for a startup partner.
